info.name: KANTIN JAWARA API Documentation
info.description:
API collection for Kaja (Kantin Jawara) system with all endpoints including Authentication, Admin, Seller, Buyer, and Chat System APIs.

Features: Chat System - Real-time communication between buyers and sellers based on transactions.

Base URL: {{BASE_URL}}
Authentication: Bearer Token
Content-Type: application/json

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register new user to system. Available roles: admin, penjual, pembeli
Login user and get authentication token
Get current user profile

üö™ Logout dan menghapus token autentikasi

üåü Logout and invalidate token

üîÑ Mengubah informasi profil pengguna (nama dan email)

üåü Update user profile information (name and email)

üîë Mengubah password pengguna. Memerlukan password lama untuk konfirmasi. Setelah berhasil, semua token akan di-reset

üåü Change user password. Requires old password for confirmation. After success, all tokens will be reset

‚ùå Menghapus akun pengguna secara permanen. Memerlukan password dan konfirmasi 'DELETE' untuk keamanan

üåü Permanently delete user account. Requires password and 'DELETE' confirmation for security

item.description:
üîê Endpoint autentikasi untuk registrasi, login, profil, dan logout pengguna

üåü Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, profile, and logout

    "name": "Nasi Goreng Spesial",

request.description: Get all available menus
Get specific menu details
Create basic transaction
Create transaction with complete details and notes
Create dine-in transaction. Order types: takeaway, dine_in, delivery

Create cash payment

item.name: üí¨ Chat System APIs

request.description:
üì± Mendapatkan daftar semua percakapan chat berdasarkan transaksi. Menampilkan pesan terakhir dan jumlah pesan yang belum dibaca

üåü Get list of all chat conversations based on transactions. Shows latest message and unread count

item.name: üí¨ Get Chat Messages - Pesan dalam Transaksi

request.description:
üí¨ Mendapatkan semua pesan chat dalam transaksi tertentu. Otomatis menandai pesan sebagai sudah dibaca

üåü Get all chat messages in specific transaction. Automatically marks messages as read

item.name: üì§ Send Text Message - Kirim Pesan Teks

request.description:
üì§ Mengirim pesan teks dalam percakapan transaksi tertentu

üåü Send text message in specific transaction conversation

item.name: üìé Send Message with Attachment - Kirim dengan File

request.description:
üìé Mengirim pesan dengan lampiran file (gambar, dokumen). Maksimal ukuran file 10MB

üåü Send message with file attachment (image, document). Maximum file size 10MB

item.name: üîî Get Unread Count - Jumlah Pesan Belum Dibaca

request.description:
üîî Mendapatkan jumlah total pesan yang belum dibaca di semua percakapan

üåü Get total count of unread messages across all conversations

üóëÔ∏è Menghapus pesan chat (hanya pengirim yang bisa menghapus pesannya sendiri)

üåü Delete chat message (only sender can delete their own message)

item.description:
üí¨ Sistem chat berbasis transaksi untuk komunikasi antara pembeli dan penjual. Mendukung pesan teks, gambar, dan dokumen dengan notifikasi real-time

üåü Transaction-based chat system for communication between buyers and sellers. Supports text messages, images, and documents with real-time notifications
